issue.title: [Python] Auto-detect Parquet ABI version when using PARQUET_HOME
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-1856](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1856). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Current we hardcode 1.0.0 in the case that `PARQUET_HOME` is set, we should try to detect the correct version by either globbing on `libparquet.1.*.so/dylib` or by install a `CMakeConfig` for `parquet-cpp`
